DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Cover sheet
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Summary","WidgetType":"form","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":12,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"showPeriodChooser":false,"ComponentMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Expense Report","metricFieldValue":"TotalExpenseReport"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Reimbursement","metricFieldValue":"ReimbursementTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 
--        e.[Oid] as Oid,
        e.[Number] as 'Number',
        jt.[Name] as Type,
        e.[DocumentNumber] as 'DocumentName',
        e.ExternalName as ExternalName,
        e.[Emission] as 'StartDate',
        e.[Due] as 'EndDate',
        ep.[Name] as Employee,
        usr.TaxPayerNumber as TaxPayerNumber,
        d.[Name] as Department,
        e.[ValueWithVat] as ReimbursementTotal,
        (select PO from Expense_UserFields euf where e.oid = euf.Oid) as PO,
        (select sum (ei.ValueWithVat) from Expense e, ExpenseItem ei, ExpenseItemType eit
        where  
      
                ei.Expense = e.Oid AND
                ei.[Type] = eit.Oid AND
                eit.[Group] = 2 
                 /*[ExpenseFilter]*/ and e.Oid = @ExpenseId /*[/ExpenseFilter]*/
        ) as TotalExpenseReport,
        (select STRING_AGG(t.Number,', ') as JobNumber
                                                        from
                                                                (select distinct p.Number
                                                                from ExpenseItem ei, Project p
                                                                    where Expense = @ExpenseId
                                                                    and p.Oid = ei.Project) t) as JobNumber

from Expense e, JobType jt, Employee ep, Department d, [User] usr
where  
        e.type = jt.oid AND
        e.employee = ep.oid AND
        e.department = d.oid and
        usr.Employee = ep.Oid
 /*[ExpenseFilter]*/ and e.Oid = @ExpenseId /*[/ExpenseFilter]*/","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]
